original: “bhante nāgasena, atthi koci mato na paṭisandahatī”ti.

analyzed: ▁koci ▁paṭi san dah ati ▁koci ▁na ▁paṭi san dah atīti
▁ko ▁paṭi san dah ati ▁ko ▁na ▁paṭi san dah atīti
▁sa kiles o ▁mahārāja ▁paṭi san dah ati ▁ni k kiles o ▁na ▁paṭi san dah atīti

original: “Sace, mahārāja, saupādāno bhavissāmi paṭisandahissāmi, sace anupādāno bhavissāmi na paṭisandahissāmī”ti.
analyzed: ▁sace ▁mahārāja ▁sa upādān o ▁bhav issāmi ▁paṭi san dah issāmi ▁sace ▁an upādān o ▁bhav issāmi ▁na ▁paṭi san dah issāmīti
